  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getActiveSlices(String)
    use DocCollection.getActiveSlices() instead
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getActiveSlicesMap(String)
    use DocCollection.getActiveSlicesMap() instead
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getCollections()
    use ClusterState.getCollectionsMap() to avoid a second lookup for lazy collections
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getLeader(String, String)
    Use DocCollection.getLeader(String) instead
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getReplica(String, String)

    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getSlices(String)
    use DocCollection.getSlices() instead
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getSlicesMap(String)
    use DocCollection.getSlicesMap() instead
    org.apache.solr.common.cloud.ClusterState.getZkClusterStateVersion()
    true cluster state spans many ZK nodes, stop depending on the version number of the shared node!

    Use CollectionAdminRequest.balanceReplicaProperty(String, String)

    use CloudSolrClient.Builder instead.

    use CloudSolrClient.Builder instead.

    use CloudSolrClient.Builder instead. This will soon be a protected method, and will only be available for use in implementing subclasses.

    use CloudSolrClient.Builder instead.
